data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Jijel that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jijel, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Jijel, Algeria.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Jijel to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Jijel, Algeria so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bedouin, Ziban people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bedouin, Ziban people.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Jijel, Algeria. Please, stir the 435 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, encourage your church in Jijel that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 636,413 who are far from you in Jijel, Algeria from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
